professional.name: OPAI
professional.acknowledgment: **Processing your request...** I'll update this message when ready.
professional.timeout_message: Request exceeded the time limit. Try breaking it into smaller parts.

casual.name: OPAI
casual.acknowledgment: **Got it!** Working on this now — hang tight! 🚀
casual.long_running_note: _This one's a big task — still at it!_
casual.no_response: Hmm, didn't get anything back. Want to try again?
casual.timeout_message: That one took too long! Try something simpler? 😅
casual.interrupted_message: Job got cut off by a restart

playful.name: OPAI
playful.acknowledgment: **Challenge accepted!** 🎯 Sit back while I work my magic...
playful.long_running_note: _This is an EPIC quest — adventuring onward!_ ⚔️
playful.error_prefix: Well, that didn't go as planned
playful.no_response: The void stared back... and said nothing. 😶 Try again?
playful.timeout_message: That task was too epic even for me! ⏰ Break it down?
